Class TableDescriptionController

java.lang.Object
uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Controllers.Controller
uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Controllers.EntityDescriptionUpdate.TableDescriptionController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/tables")
public class TableDescriptionController
extends Controller
A controller for updating description fields on "table" entities (route "/api/v1/tables")

Matthew Derbyshire

  • Method Details

    • updateDescription

      @PatchMapping("/update_description/{id}") public DescriptionOnlyHelperModel updateDescription​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid DescriptionOnlyHelperModel newDescription, @PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException, RecordNotFoundException, java.lang.RuntimeException, java.lang.Throwable
      Updates the entity description with the new description in the given DescriptionOnlyHelperModel instance
      Parameters:
      newDescription - A DescriptionOnlyHelperModel instance with the new description
      id - The ID of the entity to be updated
      Returns:
      A DescriptionOnlyHelperModel instance, with the newly updated description
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - Thrown if there is a model validation issue
      RecordNotFoundException - Thrown if the requested record is not found
      java.lang.RuntimeException - General error
      java.lang.Throwable - General error
